Keywords: Herald , Red Lantern Corps , Warrior
Real Name: Guy Gardner
Special Powers
CONSTRUCT: FREE: If no Construct generated by Guy Gardner was on your force this turn, generate a Red Construct.
SIX AGAINST ONE?... BRING IT ON!: Quake. When Guy Gardner uses it and targets 2+ characters, instead of dealing 2 damage he deals damage equal to the number of adjacent opposing characters +1.

August 24, 2022
darkknight141
If he's adjacent to 8 characters he deals damage equal to the number of characters plus 1. All 8 characters would get 9 damage. If you do the math, that's 9 x 8= 72. With a critical hit, that 8 more clix of damage. This dude is majorly slept on. He can decimate a crowd.
July 25, 2022
DestructoBoy
I...really hope that's a typo. How did you manage to get him adjacent to 71 characters??
July 25, 2022
C-Dog
Best figure they've ever made in Heroclix. You show me another figure that could potentially do 72 damage (80 on a critical hit), then drop a Flurry/Blades pog that could do another 14 damage with crits. I mean, I guess they could have added a few Traits to make the figure more like Guy. Like, if he is adjacent to Ice then you don't have to pay to get in the strip club. Or if he is damaged by an opposing Lobo then you have to be nice to your opponent for the rest of the night. Or if you went to the University of Michigan then all your attacks are critical hits. Or if Guy is hit by an opponent's Batman you lose the game. Wow, I guess this figure does suck after all. You should all just mail me yours.
